note:
Adrift in the Dutch countryside.

Always be kind, let go of your baggage, embrace your flaws, learn, listen to experts, ignore fools, forgive, don't sweat the small stuff, tackle risks, pamper yourself, communicate your love and appreciation for others, live in the moment.

Business software developer & problem solver · "Daddy Pig" 🐷 to my 5-year-old son · Husband to my smarter wife 💗 · Information glutton.
